Modul org.example.project_wobimich
Package org.example.project_wobimich.api

Klasse AddressAPIClient

java.lang.Object
org.example.project_wobimich.api.APIClient
org.example.project_wobimich.api.AddressAPIClient
public class AddressAPIClient extends APIClient
API client used to query address information from data.wien.gv.at.

Fetches detailed geographic information for a specific address, such as coordinates, street name, postal code, and municipality.

      protected Socket createSocket(String host, int port) throws IOException
      Creates a plain TCP socket for HTTP communication.
      Angegeben von:

      Parameter:

      an open Socket connected to the given host and port
      Löst aus:

    • parseAPIResponse

      public AddressDTO parseAPIResponse(String response) throws ApiException
      Parses the JSON response into an AddressDTO.

      Extracts street name, street number and geographic coordinates (longitude and latitude) from the API response.

      Parameter:
      response - raw JSON response returned by the API
      Gibt zurück:
      an AddressDTO containing the parsed address data
      Löst aus:
      ApiException - if parsing the JSON response fails
